headline: Floridians may get to carry guns without a permit. How would it affect them and Disney?
author: Steven Lemongello and Jeffrey Schweers
sentences: While the term usually refers to laws allowing people to carry handguns without getting a state permit, it remains unclear just what it will actually mean in practice, including if businesses such as Disney World could ban guns on their property.
Ron DeSantis, whom critics often accuse of shooting from the hip, is pushing yet another proposal that leaves a lot of unanswered questions about what supporters call constitutional carry? of guns.
The biggest question, though, is whether such a bill would actually clear a Florida Senate that has repeatedly killed previous attempts to pass versions of it.
